mdRecord.dcterms:title: Employee union
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Kelly, Matt
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Members of the labor Action Group took the first steps toward forming a union, creating the Staff Union of the University of Virginia, and signing a pact with the Communications Workers of America. Signatories to the union agreement included, from left: Jan Cornell, local union president; Brooks W. Sunkett, at rear, a CWA vice president; and Peter Catucci, a CWA vice president.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Visual History Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
University of Virginia. News Office--Press coverage
